person.persName: James D Hardin (Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Married to Susannah H. Withers Hardin on May 9, 1843 in Anderson County, Kentucky. Father of Thomas H. Hardin, Benjamin Hardin, and Mary Hardin. Attorney in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Attorney in Mercer County in 1860. Owned three enslaved individuals in Mercer County in 1860.
